    • Uses of RiskCardExchange in com.riskgame.service

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean RiskPlayInterface.checkForExchange(RiskCardExchange cardExchange)
      This method will check if player can exchange card to get more army based on risk rules.
      void RiskPlayInterface.updateCardListAfterExchange(Player player, java.util.List<RiskCard> cards, RiskCardExchange exchangedCards)
      This method will be called after card exchange has been done and card need to add again to total card list
